Make a function and in function go to code view and put this in

msg ("What is your name?")
get input {
  game.pov.alias = result
  Ask ("So your name is " +result+"?") {
    if (result = True) {
      msg ("Hello " +game.pov.alias+".")
    }
    else if (result = False) {
      namingcharacter
    }
  }
}
